definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 进劳教所时，抽血化验查出李的血液中携带艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 这种新型的口服抗艾滋病毒药物属于整合酶抑制剂。

sentences.english: US blood banks are screened for the virus
sentences.chinese: 美国血站开始筛查艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: The pores of latex condoms are too small to allow HIV to pass through.
sentences.chinese: 乳胶避孕套上的间隙非常小，艾滋病毒无法穿过它们。

sentences.english: Antiretroviral drugs are used in the treatment and prevention of HIV infection.
sentences.chinese: 抗逆转录病毒药物用于治疗和预防艾滋病毒感染。

sentences.english: HIV has never spread to significant levels in any sub-population.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病毒的传播在任何子总体中从未达到显著程度。

sentences.english: Cocktails of drugs can control HIV but there is no cure.
sentences.chinese: 鸡尾酒疗法可控制艾滋病毒，但找不到治愈的方法。

sentences.english: There can be no “comfort level” in the fight against HIV.
sentences.chinese: 在与艾滋病毒的斗争中，不可能有“舒适度”。

sentences.english: Accelerate scale-up of services to prevent mother-to-child transmission of HIV (PMTCT).
sentences.chinese: 加速服务的升级，以预防母婴传播艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: Xiao Huang was stricken by AIDS when he had blood transfusion in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 小黄在医院输血后，不幸感染了艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: Sub-Saharan Africa remains the region most heavily affected by HIV.
sentences.chinese: 南撒哈拉非洲是艾滋病毒感染最严重的区域。

sentences.english: I have another comment about the regional health sector strategy for HIV.
sentences.chinese: 我还要讲一讲本区域卫生部门防治艾滋病毒战略。

sentences.english: Xiao Hou was stricken by AIDS when he had blood transfusion in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 小侯在医院输血后，不幸感染了艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: HIV is predominantly among networks of men who have sex with men in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 在拉丁美洲，艾滋病毒主要存在于男男性行为者中。

sentences.english: Mindfulness may even slow the progression of HIV.
sentences.chinese: 正念甚至可以减缓艾滋病毒的进展。

sentences.english: This might entail purging all vestiges of the virus from a person's body, a difficult challenge.
sentences.chinese: 从病人体内彻底清除艾滋病毒仍是一个巨大的挑战。

definition: HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]

pinyin: ren2 lei4 mian3 yi4 que1 xian4 bing4 du2
